creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Ran a delayed start test using a temporary version of TestCompiler that does not store entries in the pairing set.

This still failed with OOME.

Turns out that this was caused by JavaSampler which keeps a reference to each sampler in order to be able to invoke teardownTest() at the end of a test when the main sampler is called through testEnded().

I'm not yet sure if this is a bug or a necessary evil; this bug is to record the behaviour.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
